author: Rey Alvarez
comment: When are y'all adding the silver face instead of jus the black face only?

reply.author: SmartWatchStudio
reply.content: We're going to add a silver face in the next version. As for the widgets floating on top - you can easily manage it by taping the *6* tap zone. This feature just allows to get the widgets visible when they're overlapped with the watch hands. So you can switch it back at any time.
